title: These are the best classic sweaters for men you can buy
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

When it comes to men’s fall fashion, nothing beats a great sweater.

Blame it on my love for Robert Redford in “The Way We Were” or Paul Newman in just about anything, but a good cable knit pullover or cardigan can instantly elevate any look from sloppy to stylish.

ALSO SEE: 'Softest sweater ever' is one of the latest fall must-haves from Nordstrom's sale section

Shopping for the perfect fall sweater is all about fit and comfort. Opt for neutral colours like grey, cream and black that will mix and match with everything from jeans to suit pants for a look that’s laid-back and timeless.

Images via Instagram. More

After scouring the internet, here are the best fall and winter options that you can easily wear anywhere. From the office to holiday parties, update your wardrobe by taking a page out of Old Hollywood.

Images via Old Navy. More

With a 4.7 out of 5-starrating, Old Navy customers love the look and feel of this soft Shawl-Collar sweater. The button detailing adds polish while there’s enough stretch to keep you comfortable all day long.

Available in four colours.

SHOP IT: Old Navy, $45 CAD (Originally $55 CAD)
